spell_tooltip.description:
Your Shout abilities have additional effects.
 Battle Shout:
Increases Stamina by 3%.
 Piercing Howl:
Radius increased by 50%
 Berserker Shout:
Range increased by 8 yds.
 Intimidating Shout:
Cooldown reduced by 15 sec.
 Rallying Cry:
Removes movement impairing effects and grants 30% movement speed to allies.
 Thunderous Roar:
Targets receive 5% more damage from all sources while bleeding.
Disarm the enemy's weapons and shield for 5 sec. Disarmed creatures deal significantly reduced damage.
Rampage, Onslaught, and Odyn's Fury damage reduce healing the target receives by 3% for 12 sec, stacking up to 12 times.

An aggressive combat state that increases the damage of your auto-attacks by 15% and reduces the duration of Fear, Sap and Incapacitate effects on you by 10%.

Lasts until canceled.

A defensive combat state that reduces all damage you take by 15% and all damage you deal by 10%. 

Lasts until canceled.

Your auto-attacks generate 20% more Rage.

Killing an enemy instantly generates 5 Rage and increases your movement speed by 30% for 8 sec.
Leech increased by 3%.

Instantly attack the target, causing 75,349 damage and healing you for 30% of your maximum health.

Killing an enemy that yields experience or honor resets the cooldown of Impending Victory and makes it cost no Rage.
Leap through the air toward a target location, slamming down with destructive force to deal 29,719 Physical damage to all enemies within 8 yards.
Hurls your weapon at an enemy, causing 36,398 Physical damage and stunning for 4 sec. Also hits 2 additional nearby targets, stunning for 2 sec.

Restores 6% health every 1 sec when you have not taken damage for 5 sec.

Restores 1% health every 1 sec while you are below 35% health. The amount restored increases the closer you are to death.
Rampage has a 20% chance to immediately refund 10% of the Rage spent.

Blasts all enemies within 8 yards for 325,341 Physical damage and reduces their movement speed by 20% for 10 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

Generates 8 Rage.
Raise your weapon, reflecting the first spell cast on you and reducing magic damage you take by 20% for 5 sec.
Lets loose a rallying cry, granting all party or raid members within 40 yards 10% temporary and maximum health for 10 sec.
Sends a wave of force in a frontal cone, causing 25,811 damage and stunning all enemies within 10 yards for 2 sec.
Bloodthirst deals an additional 20% damage and deals 20% increased critical strike damage.
Restores 20% health instantly and removes all diseases, poisons, and curses affecting you.
Maximum Rage increased by 30.
Stamina increased by 20% and Armor increased by 20%.
Slam, Thunder Clap, and Whirlwind deal 20% more damage and 10% increased critical strike damage.
Charge gains 1 additional charge and its cooldown is reduced by 3 sec.
If Whirlwind or Thunder Clap hits 3 or more enemies it hits them 1 additional time for 30% damage.
While dual wielding your damage is increased by 12% and movement speed is increased by 8%.
Haste increased by 4% and your auto-attack critical strikes increase your auto-attack speed by 40% for 10 sec.
Gain Strength equal to 20% of your Armor.
Roar explosively, dealing 318,518 Physical damage to enemies within 12 yds and cause them to bleed for 628,376 physical damage over 10 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

Transform into a colossus for 20 sec, causing you to deal 20% increased damage and removing all roots and snares.

Generates 10 Rage.
Thunderous Roar's cooldown reduced by 45 sec.
Increases the duration of Thunderous Roar's Bleed effect by 2.0 sec and Thunderous Roar's Bleed effect causes enemies to take 20% increased damage from all your bleeds.
Activating Avatar or Recklessness grants 8 sec of the other.

Assault the target in a bloodthirsty craze, dealing 624,393 Physical damage and restoring 3% of your health.

Generates 10 Rage.

A mighty blow with both weapons that deals a total of 520,989 Physical damage.

Raging Blow has a 25% chance to instantly reset its own cooldown.

Generates 14 Rage.
Enrage increases the damage your abilities deal by an additional 15% and Enrage's duration is increased by 1 sec.
Reduces damage taken by 30% and Bloodthirst restores an additional 20% health for 8 sec. Usable while stunned or incapacitated.
Execute no longer costs Rage and now generates 20 Rage.
Bloodthirst damage increased by 10%.
You take 10% reduced damage while Enrage is active.
While Enraged, Raging Blow deals 15% increased damage.
While Enraged, your auto-attacks can no longer miss.
Enrages you and unleashes a series of 4 brutal strikes for a total of 816,238 Physical damage.
Raging Blow has 2 charges and has a 25% chance to instantly reset its own cooldown.
Bloodthirst critical strikes generate 4 additional Rage and inflict a Gushing Wound that leeches 187,090 health over 6 sec.
Bloodthirst deals 100% increased damage to enemies who are below 35% health.
Rampage increases your Haste by 2% for 12 sec, stacking up to 4 times. This effect is reset if you Rampage a different primary target.
Each Rampage strike has a 25% chance to refund a charge of Raging Blow.
Raging Blow causes every strike of your next Rampage to deal an additional 20% damage, stacking up to 5 times.

Whirlwind and Thunder Clap cause your next 4 single-target attacks to strike up to 4 additional targets for 55% damage.

Whirlwind generates 3 Rage, plus an additional 1 per target hit. Maximum 8 Rage.
Your Bleed effects deal 20% additional damage.
Raging Blow increases the critical strike chance of your next Bloodthirst by 15% until it critically strikes, stacking up to 5 times.
Go berserk, increasing all Rage generation by 100% and granting your abilities 20% increased critical strike chance for 16 sec.
Raging Blow deals 15% increased damage and while Enraged, Raging Blow has a 10% increased chance to instantly reset its own cooldown.
Whirlwind and Thunder Clap deal 25% more damage and affect your next 4 single-target attacks.
Haste increased by 4% and Raging Blow and Bloodthirst generate an additional 4 Rage.

Throws a whirling weapon at the target location that chases nearby enemies, inflicting 906,004 Physical damage to all enemies over 9.2 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

Generates 10 Rage each time it deals damage.
Every 20 Rage you spend reduces the remaining cooldown on Recklessness, Bladestorm, and Ravager by 1 sec.
Every other time Bladestorm or Ravager deal damage, you automatically cast a Bloodthirst at your target or random nearby enemy.
Rampage has a 6% chance to grant Recklessness for 4 sec.
Recklessness lasts 4.0 sec longer.

Damaging enemies with Thunder Clap, Raging Blow, or Execute has a 25% chance to also strike one with a lightning bolt, dealing 272,040 Nature damage and generating 3 Rage.

Lightning Strikes occur 30% more often during Avatar.

Stormstrike or Nature damage your abilities deal is increased by 5%. Stormstrike damage ignores Armor.

Thunder Clap damage increased by 40%, and it generates 8 Rage. 

Seismic Reverberations, Improved Whirlwind, Meat Cleaver, and Barbaric Training now affect Thunder Clap in addition to Whirlwind.
Lightning Strikes also deal 61,395 to enemies near their target. Damage reduced beyond 5 targets.

Shield Slam damage increased by 15%.

Bloodthirst and Rampage damage increased by 25%.

Shield Slam and Bloodthirst have a 35% chance to grant you Thunder Blast, stacking up to 2 charges.

Thunder Blast
Your next Thunder Clap becomes a Thunder Blast that deals Stormstrike damage and generates 10 Rage.
Storm Bolt also hits 2 additional nearby targets, stunning them for 2 sec, but its cooldown is increased by 10 sec.

Stamina increased by 5%.

Impending Victory increases your maximum health by 10% for 5 sec. When this health increase expires, you heal for any amount of the original Impending Victory that healed you in excess of your full health.
Thunder Blast calls down a Lightning Strike on an enemy it hits.

Lightning Strikes generate 3 Rage.

Raging Blow and Execute damage increased by 25%.
Lightning Strikes have a 15% chance to make your next 2 Bloodthirsts have no cooldown, deal 35% increased damage, and generate 2 additional Rage.

Casting Avatar grants you 2 charges of Thunder Blast and resets the cooldown of Thunder Clap.

While Avatar is not active, Lightning Strikes have a 10% chance to grant you Avatar for 4 secs.

Thunder Blast
Your next Thunder Clap becomes a Thunder Blast that deals Stormstrike damage.

An aggressive combat state that increases the damage of your auto-attacks by 15% and reduces the duration of Fear, Sap and Incapacitate effects on you by 10%.

Lasts until canceled.

A defensive combat state that reduces all damage you take by 15% and all damage you deal by 10%. 

Lasts until canceled.

Killing an enemy instantly generates 5 Rage and increases your movement speed by 30% for 8 sec.

Raging Blow deals 15% increased damage and while Enraged, Raging Blow has a 10% increased chance to instantly reset its own cooldown.
Whirlwind and Thunder Clap deal 25% more damage and affect your next 4 single-target attacks.
Haste increased by 4% and Raging Blow and Bloodthirst generate an additional 4 Rage.

Become an unstoppable storm of destructive force, striking all nearby enemies for 1.4 million Physical damage over 3.1 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

You are immune to movement impairing and loss of control effects, but can use defensive abilities and can avoid attacks.

Generates 10 Rage each time you deal damage.
Every 20 Rage you spend reduces the remaining cooldown on Recklessness, Bladestorm, and Ravager by 1 sec.
Every other time Bladestorm or Ravager deal damage, you automatically cast a Bloodthirst at your target or random nearby enemy.
Recklessness lasts 4.0 sec longer.

Every 3 Slayer's Strikes you gain Sudden Death.

Using Sudden Death accelerates your next Bladestorm, striking 1 additional time (max 3). Bladestorm's total duration is unchanged.
Each strike of Bladestorm applies Overwhelmed to all enemies affected, increasing damage you deal to them by 1% for 20 sec, max 10 stacks.

Charge increases your movement speed by 70% for 3 sec.

Charge removes all movement impairing effects, this effect cannot occur more than once every 30 sec.
You heal for 15% of damage dealt by Sudden Death.
Your next Rampage after Bladestorm ends deals 50% additional damage.
Bloodthirst critical strikes increase the damage of your next Bloodthirst by 20%.
Marked for Execution increases the critical strike chance and critical strike damage of your next Execute on the target by 15%.
Bloodthirst has a 20% chance to cause you to unleash a flurry of steel, striking all nearby enemies for 473,074 damage and applying Overwhelmed. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.
Raging Blow damage increased by 30%.

When you Execute a target that you've Marked for Execution, you both reduce the cooldown of Bladestorm by 5 sec and apply 2 stacks of Overwhelmed to the target per stack of Marked for Execution consumed.

You can use Pummel and Storm Bolt while Bladestorming.

An aggressive combat state that increases the damage of your auto-attacks by 15% and reduces the duration of Fear, Sap and Incapacitate effects on you by 10%.

Lasts until canceled.

A defensive combat state that reduces all damage you take by 15% and all damage you deal by 10%. 

Lasts until canceled.
Movement speed increased by 5%.

Your auto-attacks generate 20% more Rage.

Killing an enemy instantly generates 5 Rage and increases your movement speed by 30% for 8 sec.
Run at high speed toward an ally, intercepting all melee and ranged attacks against them for 6 sec while they remain within 10 yds.

Instantly attack the target, causing 77,152 damage and healing you for 30% of your maximum health.

Killing an enemy that yields experience or honor resets the cooldown of Impending Victory and makes it cost no Rage.
Leap through the air toward a target location, slamming down with destructive force to deal 29,492 Physical damage to all enemies within 8 yards.
Hurls your weapon at an enemy, causing 37,030 Physical damage and stunning for 4 sec. Also hits 2 additional nearby targets, stunning for 2 sec.

Causes the targeted enemy to cower in fear and up to 5 additional enemies within 8 yards to flee.
Targets are disoriented for 8 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Heroic Leap by 15 sec and Heroic Leap also increases your movement speed by 70% for 3 sec.

When you take any damage, heal for 2.0% of your maximum health. 

This can only occur once every 10 sec.
Raise your weapon, reflecting the first spell cast on you and reducing magic damage you take by 20% for 5 sec.
Lets loose a rallying cry, granting all party or raid members within 40 yards 10% temporary and maximum health for 10 sec.
Sends a wave of force in a frontal cone, causing 25,633 damage and stunning all enemies within 10 yards for 2 sec.
Cooldown of Enraged Regeneration, Pummel, Intervene, Spell Reflection, and Storm Bolt reduced by 5%.
Bloodthirst deals an additional 20% damage and deals 20% increased critical strike damage.
Shockwave's range increased by 6 yards and when it strikes at least 3 targets its cooldown is reduced by 15 sec.
Stamina increased by 20% and Armor increased by 20%.
Charge gains 1 additional charge and its cooldown is reduced by 3 sec.

Go berserk, removing and granting immunity to Fear, Sap, and Incapacitate effects for 6 sec.

Also remove fear effects from group members within 12 yds.
While dual wielding your damage is increased by 12% and movement speed is increased by 8%.
Critical strike chance increased by 2% and critical strike damage of Execute increased by 10%.
Gain Strength equal to 20% of your Armor.

Generates 10 Rage each time you deal damage.
Every 20 Rage you spend reduces the remaining cooldown on Recklessness, Bladestorm, and Ravager by 1 sec.
Onslaught Enrages you. If you have Slaughtering Strikes, it also grants you 3 stacks of Slaughtering Strikes.
Every other time Bladestorm or Ravager deal damage, you automatically cast a Bloodthirst at your target or random nearby enemy.
Recklessness lasts 4.0 sec longer.

Heroic Leap reduces the cooldown of Charge by 5 sec and Charge reduces the cooldown of Heroic Leap by 2 sec.
You heal for 15% of damage dealt by Sudden Death.
Each strike of Bladestorm deals an additional 10% damage evenly split across all targets.
When Raging Blow resets its own cooldown, your next Raging Blow deals 20% additional damage and 20% additional critical damage.

Killing an enemy instantly generates 5 Rage and increases your movement speed by 30% for 8 sec.

Instantly attack the target, causing 75,620 damage and healing you for 30% of your maximum health.

Killing an enemy that yields experience or honor resets the cooldown of Impending Victory and makes it cost no Rage.
Leap through the air toward a target location, slamming down with destructive force to deal 30,304 Physical damage to all enemies within 8 yards.
Hurls your weapon at an enemy, causing 36,519 Physical damage and stunning for 4 sec. Also hits 2 additional nearby targets, stunning for 2 sec.

Restores 6% health every 1 sec when you have not taken damage for 5 sec.

Restores 1% health every 1 sec while you are below 35% health. The amount restored increases the closer you are to death.
Rampage has a 20% chance to immediately refund 10% of the Rage spent.

When you take any damage, heal for 2.0% of your maximum health. 

This can only occur once every 10 sec.
Raise your weapon, reflecting the first spell cast on you and reducing magic damage you take by 20% for 5 sec.
Lets loose a rallying cry, granting all party or raid members within 40 yards 10% temporary and maximum health for 10 sec.
Sends a wave of force in a frontal cone, causing 25,881 damage and stunning all enemies within 10 yards for 2 sec.
Bloodthirst deals an additional 20% damage and deals 20% increased critical strike damage.
Restores 20% health instantly and removes all diseases, poisons, and curses affecting you.
Maximum Rage increased by 30.
Stamina increased by 20% and Armor increased by 20%.
Your auto-attacks have a 20% chance to hurl weapons at your target and 3 other enemies in front of you, dealing an additional 31,853 Physical damage.
Charge gains 1 additional charge and its cooldown is reduced by 3 sec.
While dual wielding your damage is increased by 12% and movement speed is increased by 8%.
Critical strike chance increased by 2% and critical strike damage of Execute increased by 10%.
Haste increased by 4% and your auto-attack critical strikes increase your auto-attack speed by 40% for 10 sec.
Gain Strength equal to 20% of your Armor.
Roar explosively, dealing 323,482 Physical damage to enemies within 12 yds and cause them to bleed for 628,376 physical damage over 10 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

Transform into a colossus for 20 sec, causing you to deal 20% increased damage and removing all roots and snares.

Generates 10 Rage.
Activating Avatar or Recklessness grants 8 sec of the other.

Assault the target in a bloodthirsty craze, dealing 631,846 Physical damage and restoring 3% of your health.

Generates 10 Rage.

A mighty blow with both weapons that deals a total of 523,295 Physical damage.

Raging Blow has a 25% chance to instantly reset its own cooldown.

Generates 14 Rage.
Enrage increases your Haste by 15% and increases your movement speed by 10%.
Reduces damage taken by 30% and Bloodthirst restores an additional 20% health for 8 sec. Usable while stunned or incapacitated.
Execute no longer costs Rage and now generates 20 Rage.
Bloodthirst damage increased by 10%.
You take 10% reduced damage while Enrage is active.
Your attacks have a chance to reset the cooldown of Execute and make it usable on any target, regardless of their health.
While Enraged, Raging Blow deals 15% increased damage.
While Enraged, your auto-attacks can no longer miss.
Enrages you and unleashes a series of 4 brutal strikes for a total of 821,780 Physical damage.
Raging Blow has 2 charges and has a 25% chance to instantly reset its own cooldown.
Bloodthirst critical strikes generate 4 additional Rage and inflict a Gushing Wound that leeches 187,090 health over 6 sec.
Bloodthirst deals 100% increased damage to enemies who are below 35% health.
Rampage increases your Haste by 2% for 12 sec, stacking up to 4 times. This effect is reset if you Rampage a different primary target.
Each Rampage strike has a 25% chance to refund a charge of Raging Blow.
Raging Blow causes every strike of your next Rampage to deal an additional 20% damage, stacking up to 5 times.
Execute increases the critical strike chance of Execute by 10% for 15 sec, stacking up to 5 times.
Raging Blow increases the critical strike chance of your next Bloodthirst by 15% until it critically strikes, stacking up to 5 times.
Go berserk, increasing all Rage generation by 100% and granting your abilities 20% increased critical strike chance for 16 sec.
Raging Blow deals 15% increased damage and while Enraged, Raging Blow has a 10% increased chance to instantly reset its own cooldown.
Mastery increased by 2% and if you are Enraged, Bloodthirst extends your Enrage by 1.0 sec.
Haste increased by 4% and Raging Blow and Bloodthirst generate an additional 4 Rage.

Become an unstoppable storm of destructive force, striking all nearby enemies for 1.4 million Physical damage over 3.1 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

You are immune to movement impairing and loss of control effects, but can use defensive abilities and can avoid attacks.

Generates 10 Rage each time you deal damage.
Every 20 Rage you spend reduces the remaining cooldown on Recklessness, Bladestorm, and Ravager by 1 sec.
Every other time Bladestorm or Ravager deal damage, you automatically cast a Bloodthirst at your target or random nearby enemy.
Recklessness lasts 4.0 sec longer.

Every 3 Slayer's Strikes you gain Sudden Death.

Using Sudden Death accelerates your next Bladestorm, striking 1 additional time (max 3). Bladestorm's total duration is unchanged.
Each strike of Bladestorm applies Overwhelmed to all enemies affected, increasing damage you deal to them by 1% for 20 sec, max 10 stacks.

Charge increases your movement speed by 70% for 3 sec.

Charge removes all movement impairing effects, this effect cannot occur more than once every 30 sec.
You heal for 15% of damage dealt by Sudden Death.
Your next Rampage after Bladestorm ends deals 50% additional damage.
Bloodthirst critical strikes increase the damage of your next Bloodthirst by 20%.
Marked for Execution increases the critical strike chance and critical strike damage of your next Execute on the target by 15%.
Bloodthirst has a 20% chance to cause you to unleash a flurry of steel, striking all nearby enemies for 482,145 damage and applying Overwhelmed. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.
Raging Blow damage increased by 30%.

When you Execute a target that you've Marked for Execution, you both reduce the cooldown of Bladestorm by 5 sec and apply 2 stacks of Overwhelmed to the target per stack of Marked for Execution consumed.

You can use Pummel and Storm Bolt while Bladestorming.
